metadata.title: CVE-2019-17266 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libsoup from versions 2.65.1 until 2.68.1 have a heap-based bufferover-read because soup_ntlm_parse_challenge() in soup-auth-ntlm.c does notproperly check an NTLM message's length before proceeding with a memcpy.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17266` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-soup-2.4 - 2.62.1-1ubuntu0.4
libsoup-gnome2.4-1 - 2.62.1-1ubuntu0.4
libsoup2.4-1 - 2.62.1-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsoup2.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.62.1-1ubuntu0.4').
